Sirius XM Vice President for news and talk Dave Gorab called the show “the conservative news show of record.”

Former Pennsylvania Sen. and current GOP presidential candidate Rick Santorum will come on the show with Ann Corcoran of Refugee Resettlement Watch to speak about the Syrian migrant surge and what can be done to keep radical Islamists out of the United States.
On the November 16, Breitbart News Daily show on Sirius XM Patriot channel 125 from 6AM to 9AM EST, host and Breitbart News Executive Chairman Stephen K. Bannon will interview a number of guests.
Lauren Delaney, a board member of the Old Pleasant Hill Cemetery in West Bridgewater, will be interviewed by Bannon about the Veterans’ graves that were vandalized on the eve of Veteran’s Day.
Erik Prince, the Founder of Blackwater, will join the show LIVE from Paris with his assessment of Europe’s response to the Islamic State.
Ambassador John Bolton will come on the program to talk about the Paris attack and what the free world must do to combat radical Islam.
Bannon will interview Breitbart London editor Raheem Kassam and Breitbart News’ Dr. Thomas Williams, who will call in LIVE from Rome.
Breitbart News’ Lee Stranahan and Milo Yiannopolous will come on the show to talk about the protests at Mizzou.
Bannon will interview Rep. Jeff Duncan (R-SC) about refugee resettlement in the United States.
The program is the first live, conservative radio enterprise to air seven days a week.
The show will focus primarily on the Islamist attack in Paris.
